/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. The buildings, painted in shades of red and white, add a vibrant splash of color to the scene. Cars parked along the street hint at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and gives the viewer a sense of being part of the scene.
